data.what_is:
GreenRope is an all-in-one, complete CRM, marketing automation, and customer service solution designed for businesses doing big things. GreenRope combines sales, marketing, and operations into one, highly customizable software solution built for your business. 

GreenRope is more than software, it's a way of doing business. We help our users break down departmental silos to create streamlined business processes. GreenRope's CRM has all the tools and integrations you need for sales, marketing, customer service, and operations. Real power comes from an integrated approach, and that's exactly what GreenRope offers.

GreenRope includes advanced marketing automation capabilities, drag-and-drop customer journey mapping, sales force automation, customer service tools, and a tool box of other features to help manage and operate your business. 

GreenRope gives you control over your entire business from sales to marketing to customer service.You get a 360-degree view of your customers and a better way to manage and reach your KPIs.

GreenRope is one of the only true all-in-one solutions. Everyone in your organization can use GreenRope to manage sales, boost marketing initiatives, and use data to create better customer experiences. Plus, additional users are always free.

Effectively manage your sales pipeline with in-depth sales enablement tools. Customize the way you view your contacts, schedule appointments, automate follow-ups, and easily view all sales opportunities.

GreenRope gives you marketing automation that's easy to set up, test, and execute. Never miss an opportunity to provide the best customer experience through personalized communication and data-driven strategies. With GreenRope, you can manage multiple channels - websites, email, mobile, social, and more - all in the same platform.

We are here when you need us. Contact us 24/7 via chat, email, and more. Plus, we provide in-depth onboarding with personalized training, a certification program, and hundreds of online resources to ensure your success.

GreenRope is a company built around providing exceptional value to our customers.  Since we started in 2008, we have evolved from being one of the first email marketing service providers to being the first, truly Complete CRM on the market.  

Combining sales, marketing, and operations in to a single platform, GreenRope inspires collaboration with your clients, vendors, and employees and we live this collaborative culture, listening to people like you to build what YOU want to run your business.

GreenRope's Complete CRM helps business owners, sales managers and marketers bridge the gap between departments and make data accessible throughout, so your business runs smoothly and effectively with all the information a team needs to better target and serve their leads and customers.
data.product_description: GreenRope is a complete CRM, marketing automation, and more. Integrated software that consolidates & simplifies your organization's sales, marketing and operations.GreenRope provides a powerful and affordable all-in-one CRM and marketing automation solution, perfect for small and mid-sized businesses. GreenRope is a CRM built for your entire team - one place for all of your sales, marketing, and operations. We help tie your departments together to increase productivity, drive revenue, and achieve real growth.We help our users break down departmental silos to create streamlined business processes. Enjoy 24/7 support, unlimited users, unlimited emails, and access to all the features at one affordable monthly cost.GreenRope's Complete CRM fully integrates sales, marketing, events, and operations into one system, allowing for better data management, productivity amongst teams, and more. GreenRope alleviates the needs for costly integrations or multiple software solutions, and can save users over 80% in total cost of ownership.GreenRope also offers a full white label solution called Complete CRM. Pricing for our white label solution starts at $499/month.

alternatives.name: Constant Contact Advanced Automation & CRM Platform

features.name: Customization
features.content: Based on 60 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Allows administrators to customize to accomodate their unique processes.  Includes ability to create custom objects, fields, rules, calculations, and views.

features.name: Workflow Capability
features.content: Based on 59 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.

features.name: User, Role, and Access Management
features.content: Based on 65 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.

features.name: Internationalization
features.content: Based on 38 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.

features.name: Sandbox / Test Environments
features.content: Based on 28 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.

features.name: Document & Content Mgmt.
features.content: Based on 47 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Allows consuming, publishing and editing content from a central interface.  Content management for CRM systems might include presentations, documents, images and other related electronic files.

features.name: Performance and Reliability
features.content: Based on 64 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.

features.name: Output Document Generation
features.content: Based on 39 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.

features.name: Customization
features.content: Based on 59 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. System provides sufficient customization to meet business requirements

features.name: Output Document Generation
features.content: Based on 32 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.

features.name: Contact & Account Management
features.content: Based on 102 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Store and retrieve information associated to customer contacts and accounts.  Track company-wide communication and information about contacts and accounts.

features.name: Partner Relationship Mgmt. (PRM)
features.content: Based on 45 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Manage partners by tracking channel partner leads and sales opportunities.   Provide a partner portal to collaborate with channels on sales opportunities and to share product, pricing, quoting, ordering, and training information

features.name: Opportunity & Pipeline Mgmt.
features.content: Based on 81 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Manage sales opportunities through their lifecycle from lead to order. Track stages, values, and probabilities of close.  Manage sales pipelines by individual sales rep, team, region, and company-wide.

features.name: Task / Activity Management
features.content: Based on 83 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Manage and track tasks and activities.  Assign due dates and integrate to calendars to manage daily schedules and priorities.

features.name: Territory & Quota Management
features.content: Based on 40 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Assign and manage sales quotas and territories.  Track progress against quotas.  Change as needed.

features.name: Desktop Integration
features.content: Based on 39 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Allows users to sync their Email, Calendar and Contact tools with their CRM system.  Includes Microsoft Outlook and Google integration.

features.name: Product & Price List Management
features.content: Based on 41 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Enter product/part numbers and manage the prices associated with them.  Typically functionality allows users to add products and prices to opportunities and quotes if these modules are provided within the same system.

features.name: Quote & Order Management
features.content: Based on 38 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Allows users to create a quote to be provided to a customer that contain at least products, prices and associated discounts.  Order management allows users to process orders that contain products, prices and associated discounts.

features.name: Customer Contract Management
features.content: Based on 41 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Management of contracts made with customers.  Contract management includes negotiating the terms and conditions in contracts and ensuring compliance with the terms and conditions, as well as documenting and agreeing on any changes or amendments that may arise during its implementation or execution.

features.name: Email Marketing
features.content: Based on 106 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Allows users to send email to contacts in bulk.  Common features include: Built in Email templates, social media integration, Subscriber list management, sign up forms, success rate reports, AB testing and auto-responders.

features.name: Campaign Management
features.content: Based on 88 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Optimizes the process for organizations to develop and deploy multiple-channel marketing campaigns to target groups or individuals and track the effect of those campaigns, by customer segment, over time.

features.name: Lead Management
features.content: Based on 87 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Allows users to manage and track leads though a process.  The lead process typically involves steps such as:  1. Lead Generation, 2. Customer Inquiry, Inquiry Capture, Lead Filtering, Lead Grading, Lead Distribution and Lead Qualification.

features.name: Marketing ROI Analytics
features.content: Based on 63 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Enables analysis of effectiveness of an organizations various marketing activities

features.name: Case ManagementView full feature definition
features.content: Based on 67 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Tracks issues/help requests reported by customers through the resolution process.

features.name: Customer Support Portal
features.content: Based on 67 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Provides a convenient way for customers to get answers to inquiries, post service issues, place orders, view order histories, and gain access to other information contained in the knowledge base.

features.name: Knowledge Base
features.content: Based on 71 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Information repository that provides a means for information to be collected, organized, shared, searched and utilized.  Allows customers to get answers to common questions.

features.name: Call Center Features
features.content: Based on 56 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Allows customer support professionals access to all information required to support the customer including customer information, case history and related customer social activity.  Common features include:  call recording, analytics, workforce management, call script management, and compliance management.

features.name: Support Analytics
features.content: Based on 54 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Enables analysis of customer support activities to optimize customer support professionals, processes and tools.

features.name: Data Import & Export Tools
features.content: Based on 66 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.

features.name: Integration APIs
features.content: Based on 39 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.

features.name: Breadth of Partner Applications
features.content: Based on 36 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.

Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.

features.name: Social Collaboration Features
features.content: Based on 52 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Enables multiple users to interact by sharing information to achieve a common goal.  Social collaboration focus's on the identification of groups and collaboration spaces in which messages are explicitly directed at the group and the group activity feed is seen the same way by everyone

features.name: Social Network Integration
features.content: Based on 53 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Use public social networks to listen and engage with customers.  Allows users to filter what's important and respond quickly.  Often this functionality allows questions and requests from customers on social networks to case management.

features.name: Mobile User Support
features.content: Based on 51 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Allows software to be easily used on multiple mobile devices include phone and tablet devices.

features.name: Reporting
features.content: Based on 85 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Enables reporting of all data contained within the system.  Typically contains standard reports as well as the ability to create ad-hoc reports.

features.name: Dashboards
features.content: Based on 98 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. An easy to read, often single page, real-time user interface, showing a graphical presentation of the current status and historical trends of an organization's Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) to enable instantaneous and informed decisions to be made at a glance

features.name: Forecasting
features.content: Based on 51 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Enables projection of sales revenue, based on historical sales data, analysis of market surveys and trends, and salespersons' estimates.

features.name: Basic Reporting
features.content: Based on 89 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Access pre-built and custom reports and dashboards to measure leads by source/campaign/month, email performance, landing page performance, and web and social activity. Create report subscriptions that can automatically send updates to your team and executives.

features.name: Web Analytics
features.content: Based on 67 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Track which pages prospects and customers visit and how often they come back.  Capture the history in database for lead scoring and sales intelligence. Use anonymous company look-up to identify anonymous visitors.  Send alerts to sales reps of which of their prospects and customers web activity.

features.name: ROI Analytics
features.content: As reported in 41 GreenRope reviews. Measure leads, prospects generated, pipeline, revenue, investment, and ROI by marketing channel or program. The result is that you can see which marketing investments are generating the greatest return and get visibility into how marketing budget should be allocated going forward.

features.name: Revenue Analytics
features.content: Analyze how leads flow through the funnel by measuring stage to stage conversion rates and velocity.  Allocate pipeline and revenue credit among all the marketing activities that have successfully touched an opportunity as it moves through the pipeline. This feature was mentioned in 38 GreenRope reviews.

features.name: SEO / Keyword Analytics
features.content: Monitor and track how you rank for relevant keywords on major search engines and compare your overall performance to competitors. 36 reviewers of GreenRope have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Building and Personalizing Emails
features.content: Based on 100 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Create and design emails with an editor; manage templates; personalize dynamically

features.name: Sending Outbound Emails
features.content: Based on 101 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Create targeted lists, schedule and manage bulk email sending.

features.name: Manage Email Deliverability
features.content: Based on 100 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Ensure inbox delivery. Includes opt-in management, bounce handling, unsubscribe processing, suppression lists, email preview, spam checking, link validation, and delivery monitoring.

features.name: Automated Email Responses
features.content: Based on 85 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Set up automated nurturing emails based on events, online activities, and lead scores

features.name: Landing Pages and Forms
features.content: Based on 69 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Build customized landing pages and lead capture forms for specific marketing campaigns to maximize conversion and to capture the right qualifying information.

features.name: Dynamic Content
features.content: Based on 56 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Dynamically customize emails, forms, and landing pages for specific segments of customers and prospects.

features.name: A/B Testing
features.content: Based on 41 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Test alternate versions of emails, landing pages, and forms. Learn what works, maximize response rates, and increase conversion.

features.name: Mobile Optimized
features.content: Based on 66 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Support mobile-optimized emails, online forms, and landing pages.

features.name: Search Tracking and Optimization
features.content: As reported in 57 GreenRope reviews. Track performance of keywords and links in major search engines.  Measure search rankings and performance.  Improve page-level SEO with tools to diagnose and improve page performance.  Integrate with Google AdWords.

features.name: Marketing Lead Database
features.content: Based on 75 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. A marketing lead database is the system of record for your most important marketing asset: your leads and contacts. Includes a view of all marketing interactions between each prospect and your company, including website visits, email clicks, scoring changes, and data updates/history.

features.name: Data Quality Management
features.content: Data quality consists of deduplication, cleansing, and appending your marketing database. 63 reviewers of GreenRope have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Segmentation
features.content: Based on 70 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Segment your database and build list of target leads and contacts.  Filter on demographic and company attributes (title, company size, location) as well as behavioral filters and CRM information.

features.name: Lead Scoring and Grading
features.content: Based on 68 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Automatically qualify and score leads based on demographics as well as prospect online behaviors, including recency and frequency. Assign your own weights to determine lead scores for prioritization.

features.name: Lead Nurturing
features.content: Based on 64 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Automate drip marketing campaigns that send relevant messages over time, based on prospect behaviors and pre-defined campaign steps.

features.name: Online Behavior Tracking
features.content: Based on 70 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Track which emails a prospect opens and clicks, what web-pages they visit, what keywords they use, even what they say on social networks.

features.name: Automated Alerts and Tasks
features.content: Based on 69 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Create tasks automatically and provide real-time sales alerts over email, RSS or mobile device.

features.name: CRM Lead Integration
features.content: Based on 69 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Sync lead, contact, account, and opportunity information with your CRM system.

features.name: Program ManagementView full feature definition
features.content: Based on 49 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Manage marketing campaigns and programs across multiple channels, including online ads, video campaigns, mobile, virtual events, and social media. Create and optimize program assets such as landing pages, emails, campaigns, and lists. Track program objectives, results, and costs to assess the program ROI.

features.name: Event / Webinar Marketing
features.content: Based on 51 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Streamline the entire event process, including personalized invitations, registration, reminders, and post-event follow-up.  Integrate with online meeting tools like WebEx, Adobe Connect, GoToWebinar.

features.name: Calendaring
features.content: Based on 62 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Maintain a marketing calendar across multiple groups. Manage the calendar for the entire marketing department, from promotions to content to PR.

features.name: Budgeting
features.content: Based on 19 GreenRope reviews. Manage all aspects of marketing investments, including assigning top-down budgets to various groups and divisions, planning marketing spending across programs, tracking open-to-spend, ensuring budget compliance, coordinating work-flows and permissions, and reconciling plans with actual invoices.

features.name: Social Listening
features.content: Based on 38 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Monitor what leads and contacts say on sites such as Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, LinkedIn, blogs, and online communities.  Incorporate into your lead and customer DB and use social insights to segment prospects.  Trigger campaigns, and update lead scores.

features.name: Social Sharing
features.content: Based on 43 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Add intelligent social share buttons to your campaigns and content.  Track who is sharing your content and driving conversions.

features.name: Social Campaigns
features.content: Based on 39 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Schedule automated posts to one or more social accounts; use or integrate with URL shortening services; and measure likes, comments, replies, and retweets.

features.name: Social Media Engagement
features.content: Based on 36 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Social apps including polls, sweepstakes, and referral programs can enhance audience engagement.  Include these on your website, landing pages, Facebook pages, and emails.

features.name: Social Media Advertising
features.content: Based on 30 GreenRope reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Amplify brand and community stories; Reach customers by social profile and activity; Optimize social ad campaigns in real-time

features.name: Drag and Drop
features.content: Allows users to drag and drop items and content to customize their site's look.

features.name: Templates
features.content: Provides ready-made templates for simplified landing page creation.

features.name: Advanced Customization
features.content: Allows users to edit a page's HTML or CSS code, or add custom code.

features.name: Content Library
features.content: Allows users to upload and manage content such as photos, videos, and audio.

features.name: A/B Testing
features.content: Enables users to test changes to a page by administering the change to a portion of visitors and measuring conversion.

features.name: Mobile Responsive
features.content: Creates mobile responsive pages for optimized viewing on mobile devices.

features.name: Web Analytics
features.content: Gives users insight into unique pageviews, conversions, visitor location and device type, etc.

features.name: SEO
features.content: Optimizes content to increase search engine result rankings.

features.name: E-Commerce Integration
features.content: Integrates with e-commerce platforms.

features.name: Email Marketing Integration
features.content: Integrates with email marketing providers to share captured lead data.

features.name: Domain Integration
features.content: Allows companies to connect landing pages to their existing domain.

features.name: Survey Builder
features.content: Based on 12 GreenRope reviews. Enables users to create surveys through a simple drag-and-drop or WYSIWYG editor

features.name: Question Types
features.content: Allows the use of various question types such as open-ended, closed-ended, multiple choice, and ratings This feature was mentioned in 12 GreenRope reviews.

features.name: Templates
features.content: As reported in 10 GreenRope reviews. Offers pre-built templates for creating surveys with different audiences or use cases

features.name: Survey Distribution
features.content: Provides tools for distributing surveys through email, SMS, social media, etc.

features.name: Branching/Skip Logic
features.content: Helps create more intelligent surveys based on respondent's actions and answers

features.name: Branding
features.content: Based on 11 GreenRope reviews. Allows users to customize survey colors, logos, and URLs to match company branding

features.name: Multimedia Support
features.content: Ability to embed videos, photos, or other rich media

features.name: Multilingual Surveys

initial_reviews.review_title: I have tried multiple CRMs for years and GreenRope is amazing.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about GreenRope?
Power, flexibility,  the number of components - and a rare, critical feature - the ability to run multiple brands with separate emails from the same instance. This last feature is almost impossible to find in any other CRM. That matters a lot as I run several micro-enterprises and did not want me or my team logging into 5 different CRM accounts. The sales funnels and CRM for all my businesses, with their distinct identities are in one account. The automation is amazing and I used it to be worklows for automating internal service messages once appointments are booked via Calendly, sending confirmation emails to leads, creating email templates with linked files in the CRM media library, creating online group events. It's a really, really good system. And, the pricing is very compelling too. It's a real gem, that has taken 10 years of experiementing with other CRMs to realise just how good GreenRope is. The customer service is through online chat very often and they're very response by email too. I've had some configuration issues and they jumped on a call, same day. Really amazing!

What do you dislike about GreenRope?
Because it is packed with features there is a learning curve. Having said that, GreenRope provides: a) an excellent help knowledgebase within the app; b) an onboarding e-course that takes you through the modules; c) personalised onboarding training and the option to buy more training at a nominal fee; d) a heap of how to videos on YouTube and Vimeo; e) online chat support that is really responsive and helpful. So, even the learning curve has so much support around it that it's not too bad. Honestly, I have zero regrets and am only positive about GreenRope.

What problems is GreenRope solving and how is that benefiting you?
Sales funnel management.
Internal task management.
Marketing automation.
Event management.
Surveys.

GreenRope is not a cookie cutter CRM system, it was built to our needs as a mid-sized organization. They were a tremendous help in training and are always a click or call away from any immediate help that is needed.

What do you dislike about GreenRope?
I have no complaints. At times I had a permissions problem, but it was an internal issue, nothing to do with the GreenRope system itself. The permissions or access for certain users is a great function, I was just miss-assigned less access than I needed, which was rectified quickly internally.

Recommendations to others considering GreenRope:
Great company to work with. Extremely personable and the CRM makes everything easier.

GreenRope has helped me build multiple email lists and groups for expanding our reach and business. I'm able to track my progress and grow.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about GreenRope?
The pricepoint, flexibility and adaptability of the software package crates a system of systems that can be adapted to any business. My team struggled to find a CRM solution that could fit our needs. Salesforce was the 800-pound gorilla with the pricing to match; however, we needed something more streamlined, better priced, yet full capability to take our company where it needed to go that could also be adapted to our business as we grew. GreenRope was the right answer. A conversation with the GreenRope CEO, Lars, put us on the right path to properly implementing the software suite and connecting with the right on-site trainer gave our team the confidence to execute the system to its fullest capability smartly.

What do you dislike about GreenRope?
It could benefit from a more robust marketing template suite for its email marketing activities.

What problems is GreenRope solving and how is that benefiting you?
GreenRope solved issues integrating our business development, sale, marketing and customer service support. Before, they were disconnected and non-coordinated; today, they are seamless and trouble-free.

initial_reviews.review_title: Fine for small biz B2C, definitely not scalable for growing B2B
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about GreenRope?
The customer support team is great. Almost always available via live chat and are super responsive. Also, you can't beat the price, period.

What do you dislike about GreenRope?
It just doesn't scale for B2B. It doesn't integrate with anything else we use. Even basic things like tying files to companies is clunky. It's perfectly fine if you're looking to move from spreadsheets to a basic CRM, but it's just that - basic - you get what you pay for.

What problems is GreenRope solving and how is that benefiting you?
They are responsive to requests for customization. We've been able to build custom fields and custom exports. But some of the solutions to our customization are work arounds that require lots of extra steps and user expertise.

all_reviews.review_title: I have tried multiple CRMs for years and GreenRope is amazing.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about GreenRope?
Power, flexibility,  the number of components - and a rare, critical feature - the ability to run multiple brands with separate emails from the same instance. This last feature is almost impossible to find in any other CRM. That matters a lot as I run several micro-enterprises and did not want me or my team logging into 5 different CRM accounts. The sales funnels and CRM for all my businesses, with their distinct identities are in one account. The automation is amazing and I used it to be worklows for automating internal service messages once appointments are booked via Calendly, sending confirmation emails to leads, creating email templates with linked files in the CRM media library, creating online group events. It's a really, really good system. And, the pricing is very compelling too. It's a real gem, that has taken 10 years of experiementing with other CRMs to realise just how good GreenRope is. The customer service is through online chat very often and they're very response by email too. I've had some configuration issues and they jumped on a call, same day. Really amazing!

What do you dislike about GreenRope?
Because it is packed with features there is a learning curve. Having said that, GreenRope provides: a) an excellent help knowledgebase within the app; b) an onboarding e-course that takes you through the modules; c) personalised onboarding training and the option to buy more training at a nominal fee; d) a heap of how to videos on YouTube and Vimeo; e) online chat support that is really responsive and helpful. So, even the learning curve has so much support around it that it's not too bad. Honestly, I have zero regrets and am only positive about GreenRope.

What problems is GreenRope solving and how is that benefiting you?
Sales funnel management.
Internal task management.
Marketing automation.
Event management.
Surveys.

GreenRope was the right answer. It could benefit from a more robust marketing template suite for its email marketing activities.

all_reviews.review_title: Fine for small biz B2C, definitely not scalable for growing B2B
all_reviews.review_content:

What do you dislike about GreenRope?
It just doesn't scale for B2B. It doesn't integrate with anything else we use. Even basic things like tying files to companies is clunky. It's perfectly fine if you're looking to move from spreadsheets to a basic CRM, but it's just that - basic - you get what you pay for.

What problems is GreenRope solving and how is that benefiting you?
They are responsive to requests for customization. We've been able to build custom fields and custom exports. But some of the solutions to our customization are work arounds that require lots of extra steps and user expertise.

all_reviews.review_title: Best customer service in a CRM I've experienced
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about GreenRope?
GreenRope's primary perk is their incredibly knowledgeable and experienced customer service team. I always have someone to chat with or speak to when I need them most and that is paramount with software that timing is so important. I feel heard. In addition, they are constantly improving the platform, which gives so much confidence and peace of mind that the software will get even better over time. The system is astonishingly versatile in that my colleagues ask if there is a way to complete a specific goal and I ask which way they prefer out of the many!

What do you dislike about GreenRope?
Overall, GreenRope's system includes many complex features that typically go off without a hitch. While it can seem a little rough around the edges, a platform with such a wide range of capabilities will always have a few growing pains. The nice part is their willingness to address the parts that need the polish. I have not come across any crippling or major limitations to the system as I continue to attempt to push it to its limits.

Recommendations to others considering GreenRope:
This is a great program that has heavily expanded our marketing capabilities.

What problems is GreenRope solving and how is that benefiting you?
Previously, we were using Constant Contact in their cookie cutter template systems. When I joined the company and started using it, the limitations in both email customization and contact management were glaring. GreenRopes ability to accurately maintain large and many contact groups has solved a ton of organizational issues along with contact targetting capabilities. I am able to segment marketing targets to such a degree that we've had a massive reduction in unsubscribes due to being able to deliver relevant content to the right people.

all_reviews.review_title: A great all in one solution
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about GreenRope?
I like the fact that all customer and user interactions can be tracked. Also the product flexibility is great, we have the ability to truly tailor GreenRope to fit the needs of the business. It feels more like a bespoke build rather than an off the shelf solution.

What do you dislike about GreenRope?
The only issue I'd say is that due to there being so many customisable options, the migration/onboarding process can be quite daunting but does get easier the further you are in the process.

Recommendations to others considering GreenRope:
I recommend that you have a clear goal and process map prior to beginning the setup phase. As the setup is quite detailed, it can be easy to confuse yourself if you don't have a clear idea of what you're trying to achieve.

What problems is GreenRope solving and how is that benefiting you?
GreenRope solves a number of problems and at a reasonable price. I have needed to keep a track of our deals, exactly where they are in the process, and whether my team had actioned specific tasks. Previously we had been missing opportunities, therefore, losing money. Greenrope is integral to our FCA authorisation, as it ticks many of the compliance boxes required.

review_question_answers.answer: I recommend that you have a clear goal and process map prior to beginning the setup phase. As the setup is quite detailed, it can be easy to confuse yourself if you don't have a clear idea of what you're trying to achieve.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is GreenRope solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: GreenRope solves a number of problems and at a reasonable price. I have needed to keep a track of our deals, exactly where they are in the process, and whether my team had actioned specific tasks. Previously we had been missing opportunities, therefore, losing money. Greenrope is integral to our FCA authorisation, as it ticks many of the compliance boxes required.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about GreenRope?
I like that GreenRope is a complete CRM with lots of features and functions to get the most out of contact relationships. The team behind GreenRope is eager to get you up and running. The system does require an initial investment of time to learn its awesome power if you want to get the most out of it. You to take the implementation in phases and plan your design and build stage carefully. It's is very cost-effective as it's based on the number of contacts and not users, so you can get your whole organization on board as users without having to decide who needs it most. Their amazing giving back program is one of a kind and is very generous, showing the human side Lars and the team bring to the world of CRM. Everyone in the team is willing to help and answers questions, and when you make suggestions for changes that can help you tailor the system to your CRM design requirements, they make the changes quickly and at no charge. Every day I become a better CRM Project Leader due to GreenRope, so professionally, I feel the benefit of being part of the GreenRope family!

What do you dislike about GreenRope?
The is not anything yet; I will update this review as I discover anything. I might say that I would like GreenRope to work on their mobile app; I think this needs an overall and looks dated and is not easy to use on a small screen, making it less attractive for updating contact data on the move. I have several colleagues who attend conferences and would like to use the App in their pockets to update contact records easily, so I hope anyone at GreenRope reading this review may consider this as constructive criticism to make GreenRope even more awesome in the 21st century.

What problems is GreenRope solving and how is that benefiting you?
Contact Data Silos, Improving departmental and team efficiencies. We are creating a 360 view of contacts and their relationship to our nonprofit.

all_reviews.review_title: Why Greenrope is the CRM of Choice for Small to Large Business
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about GreenRope?
I have you many CRMs over the years and I have used Greenrope for over a decade. The reason I have tried and tested other CRM's such as Hubspot, Infusinsoft, Monkeymail and others is because I needed to know where I would get the most VALUE.

And although I have let the other accounts lapse, I have never left Greenrope specifically for it's ease of use, value-added investment and most important the ENGAGEMENT I am able to have with m y list.

What do you dislike about GreenRope?
There isn't anything to dislike other than the fact that I sometimes don't have access to the mobile app or a computer when I am on the road. This is usually my fault for forgetting my phone or not have a laptop immediately available.

This is the nest investment and the best value for your dollar

What problems is GreenRope solving and how is that benefiting you?
I have been able to sell tickets to live events, follow-up with prospects and clients, run a fulfill campaign and most  important I can text people and get in front of them faster.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about GreenRope?
The "there is always a way" mentality each and every time I reach out for customer service. Someone is always back to me with a solution within 24 hours, or instantly! There ability to walk me through what I need is easy to understand and efficient.

What do you dislike about GreenRope?
The data exporting options could be improved. When exporting data from surveys, I spend a lot of time restructuring it into a usable format. If there were options on how to display data when exporting in terms of the questions or person submitting, it would be much more user friendly. I sometime use google forms instead because of the export and anaylizing features it has.

What problems is GreenRope solving and how is that benefiting you?
Effective communication with customers. Tracking data and sending personalized messages has increased our customer service rating and attracted more people to our organization.
In the past, the department did not have an effective way of keeping track of interested parties. Greenrope allowed us to create systems that keep our customers happy without spending an inordinate amount of time to do so.

all_reviews.review_title: A compact customer relation management tool that provides powerful marketing automation.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about GreenRope?
It is quite economical for the services it provides. It is like any other top customer relation management software with active and excellent customer support team. It has a neat and easy to use user interface. It does not charge per user unlike other software of the same genre. For improved creativity and conductivity, its dashboards can be customized with different colors, icons and styles. It is an affordable alternative to many software of its nature and is constantly improving with every update.

What do you dislike about GreenRope?
The system is not very intuitive and robust to use. It has high customization index thus making it have a steep learning curve. It is far beyond a simple CRM software. It has some tricky data exporting policy. Their user interface is not very smart and has a room for improvement. It does not have a good email integration as well. Its email does not provide attachment option which is a bit frustrating.

What problems is GreenRope solving and how is that benefiting you?
It completes all CRM functionalities and helps in enhancing and increasing sales. All basic activities can be managed without any hinderance and clients' information, requirements and demands can be easily monitored.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about GreenRope?
What do I like best about GreenRope? Not certain that can hone in on one particular feature, so let me share the top three, or four, for me. First, it's a complete "all-in-one" CRM system - no need for a separate email campaign system. Next is the automation with the Journey feature. I also like the fact that your subscription of based on your number of contacts and not the number of users - big money saver. Last, by not least, the support. It's second to none!

What do you dislike about GreenRope?
Have not come across any downsides as of yet.

What problems is GreenRope solving and how is that benefiting you?
Workflow automation! The ability to automate all my communication processes with clients, prospective clients, referral partners and team members.  I just started using GreenRope right before the COVID-19 pandemic and it has been a key factor when having to work from home.

all_reviews.review_title: For the marketing and invoices transactions, it is the world perfect CRM software.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about GreenRope?
For the sales and marketing management, it is the best tool for creating the online sales pipelines leading contacts. The accounting and financial reporting are better controlled and managed through this software because it can easily track all of our expenses and invoices, which we are selling online sales products in the market. This software is very helpful for us to keep all the data and information about our invoices and billing intact and organized and sales marketing automation activities.

What do you dislike about GreenRope?
Sometimes, it does not manage the projects well, it also shows hurdles in handling the unlimited tasks and sales pipeline with multiple products at a time. It doesn't allow us to assign the sales tasks at one time to specific individuals but it easily allow us to automate all of our specific sales and marketing tasks. In short, it's been kind of a fussy tool to use overall which does not withstand our expectations to be extracted out of this tool.

What problems is GreenRope solving and how is that benefiting you?
The world best sales tool that automatically organize and manage all of our products without any effort. So, the organised sales pipeline help us to better sell our products and let us easily analyze and decide the strategies to follow up on our products. It also provide the collaboration and sharing features, through which we can easily collaborate and share our products data and information. Moreover, it also enable us to easily collect and store the client information and data for any future possibilities and marketing purposes.

all_reviews.review_title: Greenrope - the only CRM for us!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about GreenRope?
We have been very impressed with Greenrope's customer service! Their system is much more comprehensive than our modest non-profit could fully utilize at this time - meaning that not only are all of our needs met with Greenrope but their customer service has been 10 out of 5 stars. The offered training sessions were exactly what we needed to get familiar with our first CRM system - and their customer support has been more than willing to answer our 101 questions and even mold their system to meet our very specific needs! This by far has been the most important aspect of working with Greenrope. The personability offered is exactly what we desired when looking to help us move from manual tasking all projects into the automatization of them. We not only wanted to maintain our own personability with our students, but wished for a company that maintained that with us, which is exactly what Greenrope does everyday for us.

Another important factor is Greenrope has proven they are willing to grow. When we have requested features be updated and created to support the overall offerings they have, they have worked with us every step of the way!

Ha, and being from the Stone Age technologically, we could not be happier with our decision to follow our friends suggestion and give Greenrope a chance. For the cost, you receive much more than a fully optimized system. Even in the age of tech, we hold personal communication and customer service as a defining characteristic, one which Greenrope has nailed! We're looking forward to a long-term relationship with this company. Thank you Greenrope!

What do you dislike about GreenRope?
Some of the mobile functions have been tricky to use and are a little finicky for the user - however in all fairness this could be due to my inability to set it up correctly in alignment with my website as it is anything to do with GR.


What problems is GreenRope solving and how is that benefiting you?
I use Safari as my preferred browser. Greenrope used Google Chrome as their preferred browser. Greenrope works really well with Safari, and every now and then I hit glitches in Safari that I don't hit in Chrome. Greenrope is very good at addressing these glitches as I hit them.

This by far has been the most important aspect of working with Greenrope. The personability offered is exactly what we desired when looking to help us move from manual tasking all projects into the automatization of them. We not only wanted to maintain our own personability with our students, but wished for a company that maintained that with us, which is exactly what Greenrope does everyday for us.

Another important factor is Greenrope has proven they are willing to grow. When we have requested features be updated and created to support the overall offerings they have, they have worked with us every step of the way!

Ha, and being from the Stone Age technologically, we could not be happier with our decision to follow our friends suggestion and give Greenrope a chance. For the cost, you receive much more than a fully optimized system. Even in the age of tech, we hold personal communication and customer service as a defining characteristic, one which Greenrope has nailed! We're looking forward to a long-term relationship with this company. Thank you Greenrope!

all_reviews.review_title: I haven't found anything it doesn't do!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about GreenRope?
All functionality and features are available on all plans - you only upgrade when you reach the next threshold of subscribers.
We invested in GreenRope because we needed a better CRM - but it has booking schedules, learning platform, email marketing and a whole heap of other stuff that we now don't need to pay for because GR already has it!

What do you dislike about GreenRope?
I'm still new, haven't found anything I don't like yet. The support team are very helpful and really keen to get GR working well for me - I suppose the only thing, is that I'm in a different time zone and that can mean that I might wait a couple more hours for a response to my query - but that's really not major.

Recommendations to others considering GreenRope:
Make sure you know all the features GR offers before looking elsewhere - you probably won't need to look elsewhere, and it's likely that GR will save investing in multiple other systems.

Moving our email marketing onto GR

What do you dislike about GreenRope?
Nothing, they thought of everything on this CRM. Would never go back to the "big name CRM" systems that nickle and dime you to death to build the CRM for real world use.  They charge you for a "solution",  then you have to keep paying for more and more pieces to actually make it work in the real world. Not with GreenRope. It is an all inclusive CRM.

all_reviews.review_title: Comprehensive but not cluttered and complicated
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about GreenRope?
I have used Act! and SalesForce.  Both a have every bell and whistle imaginable but both have steep learning curves and have cluttered interfaces.  GreenRope has all the same important features but with a much more visual pleasing and manageable dashboard.  I have found GreenRope invaluable for both documenting my activities, scheduling and alerting me to future activities as well as drilling down to find out what activities get me closer to my goals.  I would recommend it to anyone who wants a comprehensive CRM but doesn't want to devote all their time to learning and maintaining it.

What do you dislike about GreenRope?
I haven't really found anything I dislike.  Every CRM has its individual quirks.  Once you quickly learn how GreenRope works you get used to its specific operation.

What problems is GreenRope solving and how is that benefiting you?
Tracking activities and ascertaining which activities bring me the most benefit.  GreenRope has streamlined my sales process so I make sure I do everything I need to and don't clutter my time with activities that are not profitable.

all_reviews.review_title: Extremely flexible but challenging to learn the framework
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about GreenRope?
GreenRope for marketing automation is an extremely robust solution at a very reasonable price point. I'll be making comparisons to HubSpot as I have used their solution as well. Here is what I like best:

- Track multiple websites  at no additional cost, add as many users as you want at no additional cost
- No contracts, month-to-month, and very affordable for its capabilities (unlike HubSpot)
- Define user fields on contact and company level, very easy to setup and manipulate
- The 'Groups' framework of the solution allows you to align sales and marketing effort quite seamlessly
- Custom objects allow you to really take customizing your CRM user interface to the next level (i.e. creating intake forms or scripts for discovery calls)
- Tons of great features for managing other internal processes, projects, accounting, etc

What do you dislike about GreenRope?
- The user interface can be daunting and confusing at first, not as intuitive as HubSpot
- You cannot have multiple tabs of GreenRope open, unlike HubSpot.
- Automation is setup in 3 areas serving very different purposes, whereas in HubSpot you can perform all workflows, drip campaigns, and customer journeys in one area
- You have to request more storage space for the media library (starts with only 100MB!)

What problems is GreenRope solving and how is that benefiting you?
- Aligning sales and marketing effort
- Managing multiple websites under one roof
- Automating internal processes

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about GreenRope?
I think of myself more as a health and fitness entrepreneur these days than I do a personal trainer or studio owner. GreenRope has me with automation, marketing, scheduling, and even follow through on tasks I need to remember to so. It helps me expand my reach and accomplish more than I could by myself.

What do you dislike about GreenRope?
Scheduling text messages would be nice, but I can certainly understand why that isn't possible with current law. That's one small thing that's overshadowed by all the cool stuff GreenRope can do.

Recommendations to others considering GreenRope:
It's worth it to take a little time to plan out how you plan to communicate so that you set up your groups properly for simplicity as well as segmentation in the future. I can't stress this enough. It prevents unforeseen problems with duplicity as far as what customers receive.

What problems is GreenRope solving and how is that benefiting you?
I use GreenRope to automate my email newsletters, drop people into groups when they use one of the opt-in forms on my website, and then follow that up with a drip campaign or automated response based their request. In short, it save me a ton of time. I also use it to send out text reminders for our classes.

all_reviews.review_title: Lots of Functionality, CRM Being the Strongest Suit
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about GreenRope?
The functionality in relation to individual contacts is user friendly and easy to customize. The ability organize contacts by groups, as well as utilize advanced filtering for contacts by any field, including custom tags and user-defined fields, is very helpful for sending targeted communications and planning trips. I also very much enjoy the ability to trigger drip campaigns and workflows is a key asset within the software.

What do you dislike about GreenRope?
Functionality to sort, organize and filter Company information pales in comparison to the abilities offered to contacts. I think this is an essential piece that is needed on order for companies to get full benefit from the software platform.

Recommendations to others considering GreenRope:
Great for CRM and email Marketing capabilities. I would suggest thoroughly testing before implementing to ensure it has the capabilities necessary for your company.

What problems is GreenRope solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have solved contact list organizational challenges through GreenRope, enabling custom communications to send much more easily. Tracking Business Development leads through the custom stages has provided great visibility to our entire team.

all_reviews.review_title: Excellent Software, Terrific Customer Service & Tech Support
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about GreenRope?
I like the ease of sending regular emails.  Each week, we send a mass email to around 20,000 customers offering a different special each week.  It is very easy for our customers to opt out, but most of them appreciate receiving our emails and stay opted in.  Greenrope software provides great reporting, so that we can determine which emails, subject lines and promotions get the greatest readership and produce the most revenues.  On the rare occasion that I need technical assistance, help is just a phone call or email away.  We also have a rep who calls us from time to time to see if we have any questions or concerns.  Over the years I have seen how Greenrope has expanded and grown to improve their service and meet the demand.  They're on the ball and I recommend Greenrope to any company wishing to streamline their CRM or mass emailing endeavors.

What do you dislike about GreenRope?
There is a slight learning curve, and once in a while, when I need assistance on a weekend, I may have to wait for the next business day to talk to someone; however when I leave a message I usually get a call back pretty quickly.

What problems is GreenRope solving and how is that benefiting you?
I am primarilly using Greenrope to send weekly mass email promotions.

all_reviews.review_title: Great tool for growing a small business
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about GreenRope?
GreenRope's efficiency-enhancing features are extremely well-integrated with an intuitive, easy-to-use interface (without the unnecessary complexity and long learning curve of competing products).  Furthermore, tech support has been top notch (e.g., rapid response, personal attention).

What do you dislike about GreenRope?
I suppose that the only "drawback" of the system is that there are so many features that I feel like I'm missing out since I haven't had a chance to explore or experiment with several of them.

What problems is GreenRope solving and how is that benefiting you?
By simplifying and streamlining many of our basic business operations and marketing (such as our web site, contact management, email marketing, project management, document sharing, etc.), GreenRope has allowed our small company to concentrate on its core business and significantly improve our business development.

all_reviews.review_title: Easy to Navigate & Best Support Team Around!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about GreenRope?
Everything within the system is very well thought-out. The way the platform is organized just makes sense. Thankfully, if I'm ever confused on a function or how to complete a specific task, the "Help" center is incredible. There are a multitude of instruction guides, videos, and more to help walk you through each process within GreenRope. I have worked with HubSpot, Infusion-soft, Pipeline Deals, and Salesforce. GreenRope blows all 4 of these options away.

What do you dislike about GreenRope?
So far, there is nothing to dislike. Everything in the platform is very customizable.

Recommendations to others considering GreenRope:
GreenRope is unique because it can be used by someone who has no experience with CRMs. The platform is laid out in a way that would make sense to someone who is, for example, a small business owner. The Help center contains every piece of information needed to train yourself and others on the platform. And if you can't find an answer, the support team is very rapid in their responses. I cannot say enough about this product!

What problems is GreenRope solving and how is that benefiting you?
We are able to plan and automate client communications, track leads, create email campaigns, create client databases, CRM activities, etc.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about GreenRope?
Using Green rope is very easy. The website is user friendly and the interface is intuitive.. Their customer service  is second to none. We considered other competitors but found greenrope to be the best choice for us.That being said, it is very complex and requires extensive training, but the staff and provides exceptional support and ensures a seamless execution. Regardless if you contact the inappropriate department, you still are provided with patient and thoughtful answers and direction.This system allows us to effectively track the success of each blast, monitor actions taken to determine what is generating interest, and create further opportunity for correspondence based on the feedback GR provides. The online registration system has also been instrumental in transitioning from manual management to online. I personally don't use GR for the sales aspect, but manage a team of sales professionals on a national basis with all different backgrounds who rave over the product. The sales management provides me useful insight as I can login remotely to monitor who is actively corresponding with leads and how aggressive each individual is throughout the sales cycle. There are many different departments within our company that utilize GR for a variety of purposes, but overall I would highly recommend it as its customization and diversity are applicable to any field.

What do you dislike about GreenRope?
They offer many other services, however no one has contacted us to tell us about them nor do we know how to utilize  them. It would be a good idea to have some training videos showing the various services and how to use them. it is very complex and requires extensive training, but the staff and provides exceptional support and ensures a seamless execution. Regardless if you contact the inappropriate department, you still are provided with patient and thoughtful answers and direction.

Recommendations to others considering GreenRope:
We highly recommend green rope.

we are currently using greenrope to send out mass emails to our client base and notify them about products, services and upcoming trade shows and other events. Greenrope helps us stay in touch with our client base.

all_reviews.review_title: greatly contributed to better structure our presales and marketing efforts
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about GreenRope?
The linkage between companies and individual contacts, the level of details and history associated with the contacts, filter options, export options, campaign support, ability to customize interfaces (even though I would whish it would go even further!)

What do you dislike about GreenRope?
System performance (reaction time is quite slow when loading a page and this hinders the agility of the user, for example when closing or updating a CRM activity)

The filter options could be more userfriendly, some of them do not work (for example we would like the option to exclude all contacts we set as OUT.

It would be good to have a way to access directly to the company list without having to go via dashboard, contacts etc...
It would be helpful to have a better overview of the open CRM activities accross all companies (currently it is squizzed on the left hand side of the dashboard, but for us this kind of overview is key).

A usability detail: It would good to be able to sort the groups differently in the drop down on the dashboard



Note I feel that the last update related to the contact overview did not add furtjer clarity and usability (you need more click to access to one contact etc...)

What problems is GreenRope solving and how is that benefiting you?
Campaign management

I personally use GR mostly as a presales tool in order to better plan and prioritize our contact efforts.

We achieved a better documentation  of our presales and sales steps, a more efficient coordination between teams members, the contact history is transparent.

System performance (reaction time is quite slow when loading a page and this hinders the agility of the user, for example when closing or updating a CRM activity)

The filter options could be more userfriendly, some of them do not work (for example we would like the option to exclude all contacts we set as OUT.

It would be good to have a way to access directly to the company list without having to go via dashboard, contacts etc...
It would be helpful to have a better overview of the open CRM activities accross all companies (currently it is squizzed on the left hand side of the dashboard, but for us this kind of overview is key).

A usability detail: It would good to be able to sort the groups differently in the drop down on the dashboard



Note I feel that the last update related to the contact overview did not add furtjer clarity and usability (you need more click to access to one contact etc...)

review_question_answers.question: What problems is GreenRope solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer:
Campaign management

I personally use GR mostly as a presales tool in order to better plan and prioritize our contact efforts.

We achieved a better documentation  of our presales and sales steps, a more efficient coordination between teams members, the contact history is transparent.

all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about GreenRope?
The ability of the tool is great. It's very powerful once you figure out all the system, however it's not a user-friendly platform. GreenRope enables you to really do a lot of different marketing automation campaigns tied to third party platforms, probably one of the best tools for it on the market.

What do you dislike about GreenRope?
The fees. Greenrope charges fees when mailing lists are not fully verified. So if there's a user email who's complaint on the list, a fee is charged. When you're dealing with thousands of emails on a list, it's nearly impossible to satisfy every user to ensure that they want the email campaign.

The UX and UI is not user friendly at all. The interface needs a revamp.

Recommendations to others considering GreenRope:
For companies who are looking at marketing automation and have a good systems admin or developer on the staff, I would highly recommend the tool.

What problems is GreenRope solving and how is that benefiting you?
We're doing marketing automation that's tied into our call center in the Philippines. Once you learn how to use GreenRope it's an awesome tool.

all_reviews.review_title: The best single solution for small business users
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about GreenRope?
The ability to get a complete relationship picture for each lead and client all in one place.  I've recommended Greenrope for many friends and small business owners for exactly this reason.

What do you dislike about GreenRope?
Nothing I truly dislike.   As with anything there are small changes that would benefit my specific business use, but I'm still happy with it as is.

Recommendations to others considering GreenRope:
Greenrope does a lot!  Don't get intimidated by all the capabilities - focus on what your business needs now and then add on as you go forward.

What problems is GreenRope solving and how is that benefiting you?
It's continued to make our marketing efforts more efficient and improve our conversion rates.  We have fairly long conversion periods due to the nature of the business and Greenrope has helped my sales team maintain consistent contact throughout.  We are just starting to take advantage of some parts of the marketing automation and am excited to get it fully implemented.

all_reviews.review_title: Dramatically increased productivity, unparalleled customer service
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about GreenRope?
GreenRope is one of the most robust and versatile systems I have worked with. After reviewing endless CRMs, our company determined GR's functionality was light years ahead of the competition. That being said, it is very complex and requires extensive training, but the staff and provides exceptional support and ensures a seamless execution. Regardless if you contact the inappropriate department, you still are provided with patient and thoughtful answers and direction.

What do you dislike about GreenRope?
Considering GR's diverse capabilities, it can impose quite a challenge if you're not very technically sound. The upside to that is the training, help forums, tutorials, and the support team provide useful information and are very responsive.

Recommendations to others considering GreenRope:
Make a list of your most important objectives, and very thoroughly clarify with GR that the system capabilities are functional for your needs. The support staff is incredible. The start-up phase is the most crucial and occasionally tedious part. To delegate a member of your team to be the sole GR administrator or "specialist" is definitely the best way to go. Having a go-to within your company is extremely useful, especially when different departments are using this for different purposes.

What problems is GreenRope solving and how is that benefiting you?
One of our entities is online marketing, and we handle a variety of clients' email campaigns. This system allows us to effectively track the success of each blast, monitor actions taken to determine what is generating interest, and create further opportunity for correspondence based on the feedback GR provides. The online registration system has also been instrumental in transitioning from manual management to online. I personally don't use GR for the sales aspect, but manage a team of sales professionals on a national basis with all different backgrounds who rave over the product. The sales management provides me useful insight as I can login remotely to monitor who is actively corresponding with leads and how aggressive each individual is throughout the sales cycle. There are many different departments within our company that utilize GR for a variety of purposes, but overall I would highly recommend it as its customization and diversity are applicable to any field.

all_reviews.review_title: Powerful engine hides inside this "khaki pant" software
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about GreenRope?
The centralized information and ability to see activity between your various marketing tools is a big plus.  We are starting to understand and harness the power of drip campaigns, lead scoring and predictive analysis to nurture leads and build our credibility.
Support is great, with a trouble ticket or question answered promptly, every time.

What do you dislike about GreenRope?
The interface is a little like khaki pants - functional but not stylish. It was difficult at first to know where to find things, but they have recently modified the organization of features to make it easier.
Drop and drag functionality would be a nice next step for setting up drip campaigns and auto-responders.

Recommendations to others considering GreenRope:
We were surprised by the learning curve involved, although I understand this happens with any powerful integrated system. My advice is to configure and implement in stages rather than attempting to put all options and functions into use right away.
For example, we started by moving contacts over from MailChimp and using GreenRope to send our newsletters and eblasts. Then, we linked our website offers to an opt-in form and captured leads. Then we set up autoresponders for the leads, etc.

What problems is GreenRope solving and how is that benefiting you?
We wanted to be inside one suite of software for core marketing activities. Social media, website, email blasts and responses to your digital marketing efforts are all visible AND actionable.

all_reviews.review_title: Makes my small business feel BIG, for the right price!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about GreenRope?
Full-featured experience right from the beginning. Your business doesn't have to upgrade to get the best features. Plus, there's no additional fee for additional administrative users.

What do you dislike about GreenRope?
The learning curve was a bit steep, but the GreenRope support team was very helpful.

Recommendations to others considering GreenRope:
The price point and full featured application of GreenRope makes it perfect for small and medium sized businesses. GreenRope is an excellent alternative to some of the higher priced, better known CRM systems (Infusionsoft, AWeber, ONTRAPORT, etc.). If you have specific requirements for your industry or business, GreenRope support will help to ensure that you get set up properly with what you need.

We are a Small Business with a small budget - but we wanted a system that would still let us think BIG!  The setup fee was within for our budget, and the monthly fee is very reasonable.  GreenRope also allows us to customize the data we collect in the CRM, and to segment it specific to our needs. And the customer support with GreenRope has been fantastic from the beginning. The staff is very personable and genuine. Sales people, technical specialists, and marketing geniuses have all helped us to get setup the way we needed to. That personal touch made a big difference in our decision as well.

What problems is GreenRope solving and how is that benefiting you?
Automated email was our biggest issue. GreenRope makes it easy to capture user data and segment the users/subsribers into pratical groupings.  Then automating the messages we send to those users becomes much more simple.

Greenrope provides focused, informed and responsive support on their platform's features and functionality. I have found this to be one of the most important aspects and greatest value when implementing automated features for our campaigns. I have confidence if we run into a poblem that a Greenrope support representative has in depth understanding of what we are trying to accomplish and how to execute on their platform.

all_reviews.review_title: I am the top level adminstrator for GR and help the teams using it develop strategy for the tools.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about GreenRope?
It has most of the functionality of top level CRM / Marketing automation tools but is a fraction of the cost.  The ability to score leads, create work flows, manage templates and landing pages as well as some of the event and other functionality is pretty robust.

The pricing is pretty incredible, not sure how they are able to provide it at the costs they do.

The help desk staff are really great - quick to answer, multiple methods of contact (chat, email, phone) and always provide the answers needed quickly.

What do you dislike about GreenRope?
Assets and file uploads are slow as you can only do one at a time.  I'm used to a campaign canvas type of tool that lets you drag and drop visually the elements of an email campaign for example  - where you create segment, attach email to segment, then determine all the subsequent steps based on the prospects interactions (open email, click through, form fill, purchase etc).  You can do the same functions in GR, but it is easier to visualize with it is a map.

Recommendations to others considering GreenRope:
Great introduction to CRM and marketing automation tools at a great price.

What problems is GreenRope solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have a very limited proprietary lead tool that our internal sales team currently uses, however there are a few different teams that are using Greenrope now since our tools don't fit their needs.   Managing a small list with some drip campaigns and tying in events has been very easy to manage, set up and report on.  Other teams are using the tool to market to other businesses so there is the B2B aspect that is beneficial.

We have limited email tools internally so using the email tool, templates and creating newsletters and other types of drip campaigns has also been very easy to use (even without html / coding background).

Having separate groups so that the lead / prospect data doesn't get cross messaged is important as well.
